entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning then west 40 gusting to 60. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 28 January 2023
